Get attainment categories

Source: R/anlz_attain.R
anlz_attain.Rd

Get attainment categories for each year and bay segment using chlorophyll and light attenuation

anlz_attain(avedat, magdurout = FALSE, trgs = NULL)

Arguments

avedat

result returned from anlz_avedat
magdurout

logical indicating if the separate magnitude and duration estimates are returned
trgs

optional data.frame for annual bay segment water quality targets, defaults to targets

Value

A data.frame for each year and bay segment showing the attainment category

See also

Other analyze: anlz_avedatsite(), anlz_avedat(), anlz_iwrraw(), anlz_refs(), anlz_tbbimed(), anlz_tdlcrkindic(), anlz_tdlcrk(), anlz_transectavespp(), anlz_transectave(), anlz_transectocc(), anlz_yrattain()

Examples

avedat <- anlz_avedat(epcdata)
anlz_attain(avedat)

#> # A tibble: 188 x 4
#>    bay_segment    yr chl_la outcome
#>    <chr>       <dbl> <chr>  <chr>  
#>  1 HB           1974 3_0    yellow 
#>  2 HB           1975 3_2    red    
#>  3 HB           1976 3_2    red    
#>  4 HB           1977 3_2    red    
#>  5 HB           1978 3_3    red    
#>  6 HB           1979 3_3    red    
#>  7 HB           1980 3_3    red    
#>  8 HB           1981 3_3    red    
#>  9 HB           1982 3_3    red    
#> 10 HB           1983 3_0    yellow 
#> # … with 178 more rows
